abstracts.cdata!:
The project would finance economic and
            engineering studies of petroleum fuels supply options
            available to Zimbabwe, and recommend the preferred system,
            taking into account cost, suitability and reliability of
            supply. The studies also would recommend improvements in the
            procurement, pricing and internal distribution of petroleum
            fuels. The project would also finance training. There are no
            unusual risks.
